attributes.action: Make it illegal for businesses to discriminate against non-vaccinated people
attributes.additional_details:
Already an airline has announced that it won't allow non-vaccinated people to fly with them, and a business has announced that it will not employ non-vaccinated people. 
The government should not give businesses the power to discriminate against people who have not had the vaccine.
People have the human right to decide not to be injected, and they should not be penalised for this.
It is the governments responsibility to outlaw discrimination against non-vaccinated people.
attributes.background: Businesses, institutions and organisations should not be allowed to prevent those who haven't been vaccinated against Covid-19 to access their services or employment.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/323442
